assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: An overview of metals, atomic crystal structure and crystal lattices. The mechanical features of materials,  surface finishing technology.
description.et: Antakse ülevaade metallilistest materjalidest, aatomkristalsest struktuurist ja kristallivõredest. Käsitletakse materjalide mehaanilisi omadusi ja viimistlevat pinnatehnoloogiat.

objectives.en: To provide an overview of  metals and their chemical/mechanical characteristics.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade metallilistest materjalidest ja nende keemilis-mehaanilistest omadustest.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completion of the course,the students should:  have an overview of metallic materials and their chemical components;be able to assess the mechanical characteristics of materials and their surface finishing
learning_outcomes.et: Aine edukal läbimisel üliõpilane omab ülevaadet metallilistest materjalidest ja nende keemilisest koostisest; oskab arvestada materjalide mehaaniliste omaduste ja viimistleva pinnatehnoloogiaga.
